import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' const _Dialog = ({header, message, confirmation, isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted}) => { let [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) function closeModal() { setIsOpen(false) } function openModal() { setIsOpen(true) } function routeToAlgorithm() { setIsSubmitted(true) } return ( <>
{/* This element is to trick the browser into centering the modal contents. */} ​
{header}

{message}

) } export default _Dialog
